info.author: Lennart Regebro
info.description:
collective.memberemails will send email notifications for the steps of 
the approval process implemented by pas.plugins.memberapproval.

It will send an email to a configurable administrator email address 
when a user is registered, and it will also send an email to the
user when the user is approved or denied.

The emails and the administrator notification address is configured
in the "Member registration email settings" control panel at the url
<yourhost>/@@memberemails-settings


Contributors
============

- Lennart Regebro, Author

Changelog
=========

1.0a2 (2012-06-26)
------------------

- Now handles the separation between pending and disapproved statuses.

- Checking the login time was not reliable, and is no longer needed.


1.0a1 (2012-05-31)
------------------

- Initial release
info.name: collective.memberemails
info.html_description:
collective.memberemails will send email notifications for the steps of the approval process implemented by pas.plugins.memberapproval.

It will send an email to a configurable administrator email address when a user is registered, and it will also send an email to the user when the user is approved or denied.

The emails and the administrator notification address is configured in the “Member registration email settings” control panel at the url <yourhost>/@@memberemails-settings

Contributors

  • Lennart Regebro, Author

Changelog

1.0a2 (2012-06-26)

  • Now handles the separation between pending and disapproved statuses.
  • Checking the login time was not reliable, and is no longer needed.

1.0a1 (2012-05-31)

  • Initial release
